name: Gold Hunter
description:
You've always dreamed of looking for gold or move large machines.
Then you can now show what is in you and grow beyond you.
In this game, we bring you closer to the search for gold.
Get ready for a unique experience you will never forget.
Every beginning is hard but you will learn quickly and benefit from it.
The only thing you have to do is find the gold.
Your time has come, you are ready.


■ First PC Gold Simulator in multiplayer mode
■ Search for gold on land, in water and under the ice
■ Single and multiplayer modes
■ Story and quests in single player mode
■ integrated chat and voice
■ controller and joystick support
■ Awards
■ extensive options
■ detailed 64km² map
■ different seasons
■ varied weather
■ Day- and night rhythm
■ over 60 claims available
■ over 50 different vehicles (some licensed vehicles)
■ over 10 different washing systems
■ unique conveyor belts
■ over 250 different items
■ Buildings and furniture are customizable
■ different camera perspectives
■ minimal survival integration (not mandatory)


You have a gigantic 64km² map available, which is only waiting for the.
In the beginning, you will not own much more than your old car and a little cash.
However, you are not alone. You can share the big world with yours friends.
With little money you can maybe just one Metal detector afford.
However, this is the first step to a successful gold search.
Maybe you should also pack enough supplies. The way to the city is far.
It will not be long before you turn on your metal detector
find your first gold in the forest. Be patient with you.
You can choose any path, it's your decision.
Your adventure has now begun.


You have over 60 claims available.
The selection is incredible and every claim is different.
But what are you doing when winter comes. Holiday is out of the question.
You have the opportunity to dig under water or in winter
you can even look for gold under the ice.


Terraforming is a very important feature in the game.
You can search for gold in any forest as long as it does not belong to a claim.
You can rent or buy a claim.
On a claim you have many more options.
Everything can be customized according to your own needs.
Search for gold and move big machines.
For some, a childhood dream comes true.


YYou can put together your fleet of more than 50 different vehicles.

There are a variety of different vehicles.
These include cars, pickups, excavators, wheel loaders, dump trucks, bulldozers and trucks.
You must not forget the boats and flying objects.

For all vehicles, we have put great emphasis on details.


Of course, what should not be missing? Exactly, a washing plant.
Again, you can choose from different systems and variants.
It can be fixed installations or mobile washing facilities.
Every washing plant needs certain conditions.
This includes water, electricity and maintenance.

Of course, here too much emphasis was placed on details.


What would a game be without items? Inconceivably.
Therefore, there are over 250 different items available.
Starting with food and drink via tools, utensils and much more.


Every machine has to be maintained and without tools you can not get far.
Therefore, from time to time you also have to check or repair vehicles and equipment.
Remember, only working equipment can get you gold.


We attach great importance to the fact that in this game not only on the
Gold Search limited. Of course that's a big factor, however
We also thought of different activities.

You can also go fishing, organize competitions, the world
explore and much more. Maybe you go after a hard one
Just work in a bar or meet friends in town.
There are hardly any limits.

What are you waiting for. Your adventure is already waiting for you.
